name: UpdateServiceProblem
description:
Update details of an existing problem in Freshservice.

Use this tool to update information for a specific problem within the Freshservice platform by providing the necessary problem ID and details to modify.

parameters.name: problem_id
parameters.description: The integer ID of the problem to update in Freshservice.

parameters.name: problem_details_to_update
parameters.description: JSON object specifying the details of the problem to update, including identifiers, status, priority, and any associated assets or attachments.

agent_id.description: Unique identifier of the agent to whom the Problem is assigned

requester_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who raised the Problem

group_id.description: Unique identifier of the agent group to which the Problem is assigned

status.description: Status identifier of the Problem. Open -> 1, Change Requested -> 2, Closed -> 3

due_by.description: Timestamp at which Problem's resolution is due

department_id.description: Unique ID of the department initiating the Problem

known_error.description: true if the Problem is a known error, false otherwise

created_at.description: Timestamp at which Problem was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which Problem was last updated

display_id.description: display id of the asset that is used for all operations

usage_type.description: Usage type of the asset  (accepted values are 'permanent' & 'loaner')

group_id.description: Managed by group of the asset

assigned_on.description: Date and time when the asset was assigned

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the asset was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the asset was last modified

type_fields.description: Fields specific to every asset type (Every asset will have default base fields and type specific fields)

attachments.description: URLs of attachments attached to the Problem request

custom_fields.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields

attachments.description: URLs of attachments attached for Problem Cause
URLs of attachments attached for Problem Symptom
URLs of attachments attached for Problem Impact

value_schema.description: Problem details that needs to be updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
